casebody.data:
Richmond

National Cab Company, Incorporated v. Rosetta Bagby. April 25, 1955. Record No. 4299.

Present, All the Justices.

Upon Rehearing, April 25, 1955.

Per Curiam

After careful and mature consideration the Court adheres to its former opinion delivered on January 17, 1955. 196 Va. 703, 85 S. E. (2d) 270.

Reversed and final judgment.

Spratley, Buchanan and Smith, JJ., dissent for the reasons stated in the dissenting opinion filed with the former opinion.
